website_summaries.verdict: A premium foundation by a top beauty brand that provides buildable coverage and is available in shades to match just about any skin tone.
pros: Recipient of Allure's Best of Beauty Award for providing long wear, natural-looking semi-matte coverage, and beautiful color selection that includes more than 55 shades
cons: Requires thorough blending, otherwise it may cake a bit and settle into fine lines
A few reports of breakouts after wear

customer_reviews.title: Fake Fake Fake!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not Estee Lauder Double Wear makeup. I am reporting this to Amazon and this is absolute garbage. It runs out of the bottle like water. The design of the bottle, the labeling, and everything about this is fraud. Garbage. Returning! BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mama

customer_reviews.title: This did not seem like the same Estée Lauder that I buy at the ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not seem like the same Estée Lauder that I buy at the department store. The picture shows department store 3C1 on the left and Amazon 3C1 on the right. The Amazon Estée Lauder is a little darker and has an oil ring around the product. I returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: SMTA

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this is genuine
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this is a genuine product as the package was in terrible condition and the color code at the bottom was peeled off and restuck. The color looks lighter than previous bottle. I'm not sure about this item.
customer_reviews.author: JacquiH

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back but I can't return it since I am now overseas 😡 it smells like
customer_reviews.text: So upset. This is a rip off version. Not real Estee Lauder. I want my money back but I can't return it since I am now overseas 😡 it smells like alcohol
customer_reviews.author: Ritzchickee

customer_reviews.title: FAKE DOUBLE WEAR! SEE PHOTOS!
customer_reviews.text: FAKE!!!! DO NOT BUY!!!!! I ordered my usual 3W2 Cashew & this isn’t even close! Consistency - wrong! Smell - horrendous! Color - awful! Product on LEFT shows the REAL Double Wear. Product on RIGHT is rotten bootleg cr$p!
customer_reviews.author: SHANNA LIVINGSTON

customer_reviews.title: It really is the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I had used this foundation in the past but wanted to try some different things so I quit using it. After a year, I'm glad to say that I'm returning to this product. It offers great coverage, it's a good match for my skin tone and once applied, it doesn't need setting powder or anything else. It's ready to go. It really does stay on ALL DAY, too. I will never stray again!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Minish

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this, heard so much about this foundation. I have dry cheeks and oily t-zone with large pores. This foundation was thick and cakey. I’ve watched YouTubers review with foundation and it’s runny when they pour it onto the back of their hand. So I’m wondering if I received and old foundation or perhaps it wasn’t properly stored? The color is also lighter than it looks in the bottle. I may be able to mix with other foundations to get the right color and thin it out a bit. It does last all day/night which is impressive and no oily t-zone.
customer_reviews.author: Cele77

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: After reading several other reviews regarding this product, I see now that the product I received is indeed FAKE!!! I thought it a little odd when I first applied it (I have been wearing this foundation for over 10 years now) it seemed gloppy, thick and off color - way too dark for Ivory. I thought maybe I received NOS (New old stock), a bottle that has been sitting around for decades. I do not know, because I only wear foundation for special occasions, and I bought this months ago. When I looked in the mirror after wearing it for several hours I thought "Who is that troll staring back at me"?
customer_reviews.author: Deb Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and instead received 9 of the .24 oz containers. Sooooo tiny! I am very disappointed that I did not receive what I ordered. Also, I decided to give it a try, and by the end of the day, my skin looked terrible! I will not be using this makeup anymore.
customer_reviews.author: S. Holcombe

customer_reviews.title: The only makeup for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup and as long as they make it, it will be the only one I'll wear. It goes on nicely and makes my skin look flawless. I'm 62 years old. I've had no work done. (I've used Dove soap since I was a child.) The makeup doesn't ever rub off on my clothes. It stays on all day and then some ... until you take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This product is superior to any other foundation I have tried
customer_reviews.text: This product is superior to any other foundation I have tried. I have used it for over 5 years and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RBS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Coverage and Finish!
customer_reviews.text: This foundation has always been a favorite of mine. It comes in so many undertones and shades that even the hardest complexion to match will be able to find a shade that works! To me, it leaves a nice matte finish which I like since I can be oily, especially in my T Zone. It lasts all day and doesn't get cakey.
customer_reviews.author: klani0220

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation I ever used so far!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the first use. The color was perfect and the finish was matte, just like I hoped. It has great coverage and no retouch is needed throughout the day. What amazed me most was that it does not transfer. Usually if I touch my face, it leaves finger marks on my skin and the foundation rubs off but this foundation does not budge! I just love everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie

customer_reviews.title: It's super full coverage so if you like that
customer_reviews.text: Some people dig it, I'm not one of them. It's super full coverage so if you like that, I suggest it (I prefer a more natural look so I don't like full coverage). I do like that you will not need any concealer to cover up any spots if you put this on, THAT'S HOW FULL COVERAGE THIS IS. It's sweat proof and great for oily people I'd say. I don't like that I can feel how thick it is on my face though, plus it settled in the lines around my lips (which isn't unusual for me but this one REALLY took the cake, even after putting on a primer) as well as my undereyes.
customer_reviews.author: Apricutie

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Started wearing this a year or two ago love it 😍♥️♥️♥️♥️❤️♥️😍♥️❤️♥️
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail. Never turning back.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite foundation. I am a full coverage girl because... if I have makeup on it is ON and if I don’t have makeup on then well.... I don’t! It’s all or nothing but this is my holy grail foundation. Been through them all. I tend to get oily by the end of the day bc of the climate where I live etc, need to set with powder for sure but that’s just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Love loove looove this❣
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING product! I have been wearing this Estée Lauder foundation for nearly 20 years and I love it!! I came across it in my later 20’s because I used to work out during lunch and didn’t want to worry about reapplying makeup before returning to work and it held up BEAUTIFULLY! I even showered ( careful not to get shampoo on my face) and it held up! Skip ahead to menopause. I was fortunate enough to get the FULL effect of menopause with hot flashes that toasted my bagel just by touching it! 😩 lol. Still....IT HELD UP!! My skin had changed dramatically since my 20’s but I won’t change my foundation. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Tranquil Wood By Dave

customer_reviews.title: My GO TO
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. It covers sun spots, acne, discoloration etc. It looks natural and I use the double wear stay in place powder makeup over it. Quick and easy morning routine for a teacher! SO HAPPY! I have been using this product for three years now, and let me tell you I have tried it all. I have combination skin, dry/oily in different spots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long even with super oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for years for makeup that can last! I have very very oily skin and usually have to re-apply long wear makeup every few hours unless I cake it on. Double wear is incredible and my skin looks good too! Definitely recommend. I also bought the same color from a known store and the one sold on here is exactly the same: same color, same bottle, same consistency. Not sure why people claim it’s not.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Is NOT authentic.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Estee Lauder for years. This is NOT legit. Doesn't have the same coverage. Bottles do not match. They attempted to make it look legit. But, side by side with an authentic. You can see a difference. I used real foundation and this fake side by side. Color does not match or have same coverage. Was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer DeLano

customer_reviews.title: Skin perfecting
customer_reviews.text: It really does stay in place until I wash it off. This is my favorite foundation ever because it evens out my skin tone and camouflages all my wrinkles and acne scars without looking like pancake makeup. My skin just looks naturally flawless all day long. It also has sunscreen now. I highly recommend this foundation. I just turned 60 but many people have told me I look like maybe I just turned 50. Oh—and don’t let the price scare you. You need very little for a single application and one bottle lasts for many months.
customer_reviews.author: Machell G

customer_reviews.title: The only foundation I'll use
customer_reviews.text: I literally will spend up to 30 precious seconds of waiting (even while late for work!) for every last drop to pour onto my sponge when I've neglected to buy/order more before I'll use anything else! Even today I got the infamous question, "Are you getting sick?" when I went into work just casually/incognito to purchase a few items. That I looked "red and flushed." ..."no, that's just my normal face. It's no makeup/day-off, shush!" So it makes more difference than others realize! But I certainly know the difference..as do they apparently!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Saw it in someone else and bought!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea this foundation was such a great option. It has excellent coverage and provides you with all day color. There are a lot of options for different skin tones which could be overwhelming but I think most people would like the opportunity to have a good match. You do need to scrub your hands after application as it really lives up to the longevity claim. I often mix it with my tinted sunscreen and it provides a little added protection and color. Overall great foundation.
customer_reviews.author: KathOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love how easily this makeup applies and blends. It lasts all day, only requiring a single application. I find that a bottle lasts several months and covers most all skin imperfections. I highly recommend. No Unpleasant odor.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: love this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I used this foundation years ago.Somewhere along the line I stopped using it. I was unhappy with my current foundation now that i’m older and have more fine lines and wrinkles. Out of desperation I decided to try this again. I am so happy I did. It gives light to medium coverage and doesn’t set into fine lines or wrinkles. It lasts all day but does start to fade at my nose and chin around eight hours. I do have to powder for a more matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase from buyer
customer_reviews.text: I received this product in the mail today. This product came used and in the wrong box for the color shade purchased. He outside of the lid had old dried foundation on it and when I removed the lid gain foundation everywhere. This is not a new product
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: By far one of my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I have tons of different foundations but I have an exclusive top five foundations and this is hands down number 2 following the amazing Gorgio Armani Luminous silk. The foundation that Flower beauty put out is also the BEST drugstore foundation I own. (just wanted to throw that out there)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kersey

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed- best foundation ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a million foundations ranging in quality/price from CVS to the Chanel counter at Saks Fifth Ave and this is the BEST! I have combination sensitive skin that tends to get greasy throughout the day, but this stuff keeps me pretty matte all day. I’ve been getting so many compliments from people on my skin. Covers redness but doesn’t look caked on, and feels super smooth for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bacon

customer_reviews.title: My skin gets oily very easily but my complextion stayed matte all day and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I am asian and have a golden tone. I am slightly tan and when I first applied, it initially looked too light on me but it blended into my skin tone! My skin gets oily very easily but my complextion stayed matte all day and it didnt smudge or rub off on onto anything. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love this make-up. Feels light an coverage is amazing. No need for consealer even with bad acne. Went to Estee Lauder website an did their foundation match questionnaire to find my color an combination and wow it matches perfectly...no more head transplant look.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Heavy coverage for me
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a great product for a younger person. I Love Estee Lauder ! But for me this liquid makeup seemed to be to heavy ! Must be my age! Normally wear one in this line but a lighter covering one ! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Santaclaus Northpole

customer_reviews.title: I knew what it should smell like. The coverage seemed the same
customer_reviews.text: Did not seem genuine. I smelled rubbing alcohol in this. After buying this foundation before from department store cosmetic counters, I knew what it should smell like. The coverage seemed the same, but the scent concerned me.
customer_reviews.author: JAU

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this double wear make-up. It stays on and covers very well!!! I like the yellow tone in this shade; it work well with my light skin and gives me a healthy look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I refuse to use anything else. I have used it for years. The coverage is great, and doesn't feel heavy. I have tried alot of face makeup in my days and this is really the best.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: really good product
customer_reviews.text: it does go on and stays on much longer than any I've purchased elsewhere, the price is a bit high, that's why 4 stars, it lasts for months so that helps. I have acne scarred and delicate skin (irish) so the fact that it helps my skin to look better is great! Use with a really good cleanser and moisturizer routine and should be ok.
customer_reviews.author: KD Stragh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is so not worth the money. Even with applying a face primer before the foundation it enhances my large pores. It feels sticky like and when you add loose powder it just looks caked on. Just so disappointing especially since I paid high dollars for this.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: NO FOUNDATION IN THE BOTTLE WHEN I RECEIVED IT!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Estee Lauder foundation and there was barely any product in the bottle. I'm not exaggerating when I say this bottle was basically empty. I could barely get 2 uses out of it. I am very disappointed and deserve a full refund!
customer_reviews.author: Rmr

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product online due to Covid and ulta being closed. After 6 weeks of the worst face breakout I've ever experienced in my life, I'm working through process of elimination. Came back to read other reviews and I think I've found the culprit. I will probably need a professional dermatologist and pretty sure will have permanent scars on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only foundation I really like! It was delivered in great condition! If you buy this foundation, know that you have to blend it right away. The foundation was made so that the makeup doesn't come off easily and lasts longer!
customer_reviews.author: Debora Alarcon

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying DW for years. Same shade. This is not the same formula. It is lighter and not estee lauder. I have since bought the "real " foundation and can tell...for someone who doesnt know, this foundation might be okay. I tried to make due with it because i missed return window, but it doesnt even last till lunch. ....buyer beware....dont waste money or time.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: Ladies, if you want full,flawless coverage this product delivers to you a new face. I can't live without it. I discovered it at Macy's and was so glad to find it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa V.

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Double Wear for the last four years, and I have no plans to switch to another brand. It blends in perfectly and stays on FOREVER. Some days, I'll apply it, shower with it on, and sleep with it on, and still have it on when I wash my face the next day. It doesn't look cakey but really evens out my skin tone well. I recommend it to anyone looking for a new foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: My “go to” foundation
customer_reviews.text: Works great and lasts throughout the day. Coverage is medium but buildable. Color match is good. I’m over 50 and have a few fine lines and creepy looking skin under my eyes. I moisturize well prior to applying this and I really like the results. I bottle lasted me a couple of months so it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: DeNage Cagle

customer_reviews.title: Great product, trusted seller!
customer_reviews.text: Verified authentic bottle! Thanks for the speedy shipping I was able to avoid the trip to sephora lol this is my new go to makeup for my oily skin. I'll never use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: MalloryV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect foundation!
customer_reviews.text: The holy grail of foundations! Perfect coverage and the shade (1W1 Bone) is perfect for those of us who are pale and want a touch of color. Arrived quickly and with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: michelleh

customer_reviews.title: This bottle was not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this makeup for years. It is a great product that last 12 to 14 hours and still looks great. That being said the bottle I received was not up to quality standards. The foundation was gooey and separated even after shaking it vigorously. I have ordered on amazon before with no problems. So idk if the bottle got overheated or was just old
customer_reviews.author: Candice MacClamrock

customer_reviews.title: Normally love it. This bottle feels thick and tacky. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is the foundation that I’ve used for the past several months, but typically purchase it at department stores or Ulta. This bottle of it feels thicker and “tacky” and seems to be clogging my pores around my nose. Not sure what happened but the consistency is just “different”. Will stick to buying it at the store in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA PRATT

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It stays on ALL DAY
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It stays on ALL DAY! Perfect match and great coverage. Looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: They sent an old product
customer_reviews.text: So here's the deal. They sent an me an old shelf product, which multiple people have commented on and its incredibly frustrating. If I'm going to spend 40+ dollars on foundation I don't want the back shelf.... Overall though, I work outdoors for a living and hit the gym right after work with a full face. I have been using this and Urban Decay De-slick setting spray and it has lasted all day and looks great! It is easy to make it too cakey however, so I'd suggest using a blending sponge that you've gotten wet then squeezed the excess moisture out of. Helps it blend much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Knoellinger

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Shade Sent
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong shade but didn’t realize until after the return window closed. Double check your box! As a foundation, this is by far my favorite. It gives full coverage, while blending well, AND doesn’t break out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Leeny127Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cause she loves this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend who had to go out of town just to buy it because we live in a rural area. She told me it was worth the trip but I ordered it for her with the 2 day shipping and she saved some gas money. She just loves this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: KCdeeah

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: 100% believe this is fake! I’ve been using this product for years and it worked perfectly! This one time I ordered it from amazon and it looks like sunscreen! Cakey and gross... it even burns my skin a little. Do NOT buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe it is fake!
customer_reviews.text: I had reservations about buying this product because of some of the reviews saying it was fake. However, I am 67 years old and have used the double wear since I was very young, and have always purchased it at Macy’s. When I received the product it was nicely packaged and when I used it, it was exactly like the makeup I have always worn. Very happy with this product. Yes, it does have a warning label on it unlike the product from Macy’s, not too sure why it does, but am VERY happy with my purchase. Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L Ruff

customer_reviews.title: Colors don’t match
customer_reviews.text: If you are use to the original double wear, I would not buy this one. The colors are not the exact same. I ordered my normal color and noticed it was lighter than my original. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: I have missed this foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation! Havent used this in 6 years but smells the same and is the exact same packaging and bottle as other Estee Lauder Double Wear Foundations sold in Sephora. I definitely did my research before and after purchasing and it looks great on me, matches my skin color perfectly, even smells the exact same as it did 6 years ago. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Quinata II

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, best, buy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. I purchased kind prime, from Beauty to Beauty llc, Dallas, via Amazon and it's real, and perfect. The number one seeing foundation in the USA makes sense. No transfer, waterproof, and it looks awesome. Thank you! Xo.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderland

customer_reviews.title: Works with mask
customer_reviews.text: Always use this now I can get it when you can’t get to the department store. Great product I wear a mask at work and it stays in place for a 12 hr shift.
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I sensitive skin and have been buying Estee Lauder Double Wear for the past 3 years so when I saw a cheaper price on here I thought I'd give it a go. I started breaking out with cyst acne that did not want to go away. I didn't think anything of it until I ordered a second bottle and when I received it the bottle was taped shut like somebody had opened it and there was a white label over the box. I went back to the official website and purchased a new bottle. After I started using the new bottle the cyst acne went away.
customer_reviews.author: Krista R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing coverage, lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I will ever use anything else. This has been my stand by for years now. This foundation lasts all day and has amazing coverage. Every time any of my colleagues ask what I use for makeup I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Brunner

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best foundation ever. I work 8n a restaurant, you run around and get hot & sweaty. Especially in summer. I can stand patches of no makeup where I've been sweating (upper lip, under eyes). I do not have time to grab makeup and constantly fix. I can put this in in the morning, work a hot & bust double shift and when I get home it's just as good as it was in the morning. Been using now since 2008 and nothing I've tried even comes close.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coverage Accurate Color Match A Must
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product light weight does excellent coverage. Have been using for several years - never disappoints - be sure you match your color accurately - first time I purchased was in a store to ensure color match was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ev robinson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best make-up for coverage and long-wear. I do not have to do touch-ups after several hours of wear. Some foundations like this look caked on, but this looks natural. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bevpin

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I've been using it for years and is the best double coverage foundation on the market. Srays in place all day. I've tried switching to try other products but keep coming back. Seller was awesome, got my order to me immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation EVER!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this foundation! I use a moisturizer beforehand and it glides on with ease. Once applied, does not move! No cracking or splotches! Does not transfer to clothing or any other surface after it dries. This is my “go to” foundation!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best makeup there is ! Always stays on all day and has a natural look to it!
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Colors don’t match store product
customer_reviews.text: The color is not the same as the counter ... true Estée Lauder. I love this make up I’ve worn it for 7 years and first time I ordered my color which was 2 shades lighter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but love! Its a stay in place makeup for sure
customer_reviews.text: Heavy coverage, but love! Its a stay in place makeup for sure, you have to really wash your face at night to get it all out of your pores.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: A flawless finish!
customer_reviews.text: A little pricy, but a little goes a long way. I mix in a drop or two of oil before applying. Love the stuff! I have sensitive skin and I have no issues with this! I’m 59 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Caeli Elaine

customer_reviews.title: what happened?
customer_reviews.text: Either estee lauder has changed the formula, or this is a fake. I"ve used Double Wear for almost 2 years now, but this was NOT the same makeup. It was awful- dried so quickly it was hard to blend, settled into every pore and fine line, too much of a "yellow" color....it just looked really BAD on my face. I paid waaay too much for this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation
customer_reviews.text: I have used for 10 years. Best foundation & coverage ever!
customer_reviews.author: Jan G.

customer_reviews.title: It’s FAKE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I would! Ive been using double wear for a year now and this is a FAKE from a mile away!!!! Please dont waste your money. It smells like straight up paint, and even has a warning label on the back which real Estée Lauder products do not !!!! Can’t beleive amazon can sell fake makeup. I’ll never trust amazon for makeup again...
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and have never found a foundation where I wasn't blotting the excess oil off my forehead only a few hours after it was applied until now. It works great all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE FOUNDATION
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is A MUST HAVE. The coverage is flawless. Covers up anything! Lasts all day long. It withstands sweat, tears...you name it! If you have dry skin I suggest a hydrating setting spray to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Kaletha

customer_reviews.title: One application in the morning with some powder to set and my makeup is great all day
customer_reviews.text: I found this product a few years back, and have never turned back! I was matched in the store and buy this product now here. I always receive complements on my face makeup and complexion. (I have some dark spots, and dark bags under my eyes). This makeup is a lifesaver! One application in the morning with some powder to set and my makeup is great all day!
customer_reviews.author: TipsFromTori

customer_reviews.title: This make up makes your face look like porcelain.
customer_reviews.text: Are used to use other make up, but was always touching up my face. This make up stays on all day, and I don’t have to worry about it coming off. As a busy person I get so into my day and I love that I don’t have to worry about looking beat up. This make up covers everything and makes your face look great.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased to see that Amazon offered the Estee Lauder make-up that I like! Saved me a trip to the mall! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Anne R.

customer_reviews.title: but the product itself is great. stays on all day and is very breathable
customer_reviews.text: its hard to tell the color that you need from online, but the product itself is great. stays on all day and is very breathable. you only need a little to cover your whole face and i just apply it with my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marie

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be real or really old
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the real deal. The smell is different. The way it applies. More oily and I’ve used this product for over a year and it’s never broken my face out. My face from day one has broken out severely. The color isn’t even the exact same.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew burns

customer_reviews.title: I am super picky with foundation and this stuff is great
customer_reviews.text: I am super picky with foundation and this stuff is great. Somehow I managed to pick out a color online that matches my skin perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: I have found my new foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this foundation bc I heard it was great for oily skin. I have found my new favorite foundation!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Danos

customer_reviews.title: Go-to Foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite full-coverage liquid foundation. There are so many shades. It's full coverage, but doesn't feel cakey and stays on all day long. A little goes a long ways, so the bottle should last a while!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Starke

customer_reviews.title: Now, my favorite foundation!
customer_reviews.text: Will purchase again. I have extremely oily skin and have had trouble finding a foundation that I don’t have to blot every couple of hours. This is now my holy grail.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Acrey

customer_reviews.title: I get complements when I wear it
customer_reviews.text: The best foundation for me . Full coverage but doesn’t feel too heavy. A small amount goes a long ways. I use very little under my eyes though because it can accentuate wrinkles there. (One star off for that)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K. C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for my favorite high end make up.
customer_reviews.text: I have loved Estee Lauder Double Wear foundation for several years now. In most retail stores, it sells for $43. I'll be ordering mine from Amazon from now on. This make up gives great coverage without looking like it's "caked" on. Lasts all day and I have gotten many positive comments about my complexion. It makes your skin look like you have no flaws!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for Oily Skin types
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend. I'm an oily skin girl and have been looking for a foundation that will last all day without sliding off my face. Coming from a tropical country, I do not need to use a setting spray. The Estee Lauder foundation definitely holds your makeup in place.
customer_reviews.author: LostAngel26

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Makeup
customer_reviews.text: I have used Estee Lauder makeup for a number of decades and find them to be the best of the market. This makeup provides good coverage, is comfortable on the skin, and has a somewhat dewy finish while having all the benefits of a matte finish. The dewy finish is natural looking and not overly dewy; it just add a bit of a glow that I like. It is a bit pricey, but not overly so -- worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Peterson

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my wife's favorite and she will continue to use it as long as the manufacturer makes it.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana James

customer_reviews.title: The best full coverage foundation!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a plethora of foundations, and this is by far and away the best one. It's full coverage, doesn't come off until you remove it, and matches my skin tone perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: divelove

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing this product, and I'm very happy with it. Initially, it doesn't appear much different than a drugstore brand foundation but as the day wears on my face continues to have a fresh look as though my makeup was just applied. I really like the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: theresa demian

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t wash off so some might like that.... But I didn’t .... Made my face break out
customer_reviews.author: Tyra Shelton

customer_reviews.title: This is the best foundation out there!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this foundation. Looks amazing the entire day. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coverage
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful coverage and perfect on oily or dry skin. Breathable and perfect look. Great coverage without looking too heavy on skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Covers dark spots extremely well.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Smooth. I dab it over my sun spots and it covers them extremely well paired with concealer. No caking issues. Not noticeable. Natural looking. A little bit goes a LONG way. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stay on makeup I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best stay on makeup I've ever used. Doesn't wear off all day long .Only makeup I will ever use again. You can use a little or use more where you have bad skin spots. It blends in great. Love it
customer_reviews.author: tina hauser

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Make-up
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite make-up.... I have been using it for a long time. The coverage is great and it looks very natural.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great value on a great product. Much cheaper than shopping mall prices.
customer_reviews.author: D. Guest

customer_reviews.title: seemed old and did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: product seemed old and did not glide on. I wonder if it is a fake item
customer_reviews.author: Donna Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Stay power
customer_reviews.text: Favorite makeup hands down. Been using this brand for about a year and I love it. It stays all day through 12 hour nursing shifts without budging.
customer_reviews.author: Tosh

customer_reviews.title: Nice & light full coverage makeup
customer_reviews.text: Great value!!! This base is so light feeling on your skin but the coverage is great. A little goes a long way so it’s lasts for months!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Z Jones

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Fake foundation.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a real Estee Lauder. Fake! Fake! Fake! Can be dangerous for skin. Made in Canada. Don't buy from this seller. Better to pay extra bucks and a get a real product from Department store.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Pavlova

product_meta.title: Estee Lauder Double Wear Stay-in-Place Makeup, 1 oz / 30 ml (2C3 Fresco)
product_meta.description: Color:2C3 FrescoLong-wearing makeup with 15-hour staying power. Looks flawless and natural. Lasts through heat, humidity, non-stop activity. Won't change color, smudge or come off on clothes. Feels lightweight and comfortable. For a look that lasts all day, without touchups. Semi-matte. Oil-free. Fragrance-free Full Size, 1oz/30ml. In Box.
feature_bullets: It is Brand New in Box. No Damged
